Sentencas: A supercapacitor is a potential energy system that will be a part of an efficient storage device of renewable energy, such as a small battery and a large energy storage system (ESS), etc.
Titulo: Influence of the Perovskite La0.8Sr0.2Mn0.5Co0.5O3-δon the Electrochemical Performance of the Graphene-Based Supercapacitor

Sentencas: However, a lot of efforts have been devoted to improving stability.
Titulo: Influence of the Perovskite La0.8Sr0.2Mn0.5Co0.5O3-δon the Electrochemical Performance of the Graphene-Based Supercapacitor

Sentencas: Generally, ABO(3)-type perovskite structure has been studied as an electrode and/or an oxide ion-conducting electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells with stable structural stability at high temperatures.
Titulo: Influence of the Perovskite La0.8Sr0.2Mn0.5Co0.5O3-δon the Electrochemical Performance of the Graphene-Based Supercapacitor

Sentencas: In this study, perovskite material (La0.8Sr0.2Mn0.5Co0.5O3-delta. LSMCO) was added as a component of the supercapacitor electrode for enhanced stability.
Titulo: Influence of the Perovskite La0.8Sr0.2Mn0.5Co0.5O3-δon the Electrochemical Performance of the Graphene-Based Supercapacitor

Sentencas: According to electrochemical measurements, at 5 mV/s, the specific capacitance of the graphene-based electrode (G95) is 68 F/g, and the electrode mixed with perovskite (G70L25) is 55 F/g.
Titulo: Influence of the Perovskite La0.8Sr0.2Mn0.5Co0.5O3-δon the Electrochemical Performance of the Graphene-Based Supercapacitor

Sentencas: Nonetheless, the standard deviation of the capacitance value of G70L25 is smaller than that of G95.
Titulo: Influence of the Perovskite La0.8Sr0.2Mn0.5Co0.5O3-δon the Electrochemical Performance of the Graphene-Based Supercapacitor

Sentencas: Alongside this, the G70L25 electrode showed that specific capacitance decreased in the cycling test, but, for the G95 electrode, the specific capacitance after the 4990th cycle increased or decreased, resulting in unpredictable results.
Titulo: Influence of the Perovskite La0.8Sr0.2Mn0.5Co0.5O3-δon the Electrochemical Performance of the Graphene-Based Supercapacitor

Sentencas: Therefore, perovskite added electrode (G70L25) shows higher stability compared to the graphene nanoplatelets electrode (G95) in both initial and cycling performance, albeit a lower specific capacitance.
Titulo: Influence of the Perovskite La0.8Sr0.2Mn0.5Co0.5O3-δon the Electrochemical Performance of the Graphene-Based Supercapacitor
